roles.name: LMS - Instructor
roles.description: Role for third-party instructors. Can only edit their own content.

roles.name: Team Member
roles.description: Role for internal team members and employees

roles.name: Website API
roles.description: Role for using static tokens for server to server communication. Do not use on client side.

roles.name: LMS - User
roles.description: Role for the users of the LMS. Only access the content through front-end.

roles.name: LMS - Internal Team Member
roles.description: Role for team members that don't need admin access. Can update all content.

policies.name: LMS - Instructor
policies.description: Role for third-party instructors. Can only edit their own content.

policies.name: Team - App Access
policies.description: Grants Directus Studio access to team members

policies.name: Content - Edit
policies.description: Grants ability to edit content for the website

policies.name: Help Center - Create Feedback
policies.description: Policy to allow creating feedback on articles.

policies.name: LMS - User
policies.description: Role for the users of the LMS. Only access the content through front-end.

policies.name: LMS - Internal Team Member
policies.description: Role for team members that don't need admin access. Can update all content.
